book.title: The Campaign of Sedan
book.description: 简介： When it was decided to publish a new and cheaper edition of Mr. George Hoopers Sedan, the question arose whether anything should be added to it. My father had intended, should a new edition be called for, to revise and correct the work, and to furnis...
